q1: Who is Real Madrid's most expensive player?
a2: I think Real Madrid would sell him if they could get a better player for less money.
q3: Who is more successful - Real Madrid or Barcelona?

a4: Barcelona had a great season last year, but I think that Real Madrid have a real chance. They are not used to being the underdogs.

a5: Yeah that will be a bummer.
